amendment.description: Amendment amends sections 501 and 502 of the bill in order to set a national standard for consumer access to credit scores and credit reports.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record which makes bill provisions regarding free credit reports and consumer access to credit scores a national standard by pre-empting any future state laws in either area.
